hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Regime Transition - Implied vs Realized Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 30-day realized volatility drops below 40% while 30-day ATM implied volatility remains above 55% during NEUTRAL regimes, the volatility risk premium is overpriced and will compress within 5 trading days, creating a short volatility opportunity.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During neutral regimes, volatility tends to mean-revert. The current 18% drawdown since Trump took office suggests elevated fear premium in options pricing that may not be justified by actual price action. The RV/IV spread of >15% represents an attractive risk premium for volatility sellers.
entry_conditions: No major scheduled macro events in next 3 days

exit_conditions.take_profit: RV/IV ratio crosses above 0.85 or IV drops by 15%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: RV/IV ratio drops below 0.65 or IV increases by 10%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If RV/IV ratio continues to decline or IV remains elevated despite stable price action for >7 days, hypothesis fails. Would indicate structural change in volatility pricing.
